description: > LOW CONFIDENCE! | Evaluating the feasibility of frequent digital cognitive assessment in the PREVENT dementia study | a smartphone app for clinical research studies | The Mezurio app lets you complete interactive, scientifically valuable measurement tasks. It’s designed to be used as part of a research study. It helps you become an even more valuable part of that research by letting you contribute new kinds of data: quickly, frequently, and from the comfort of your own home
name: Mezurio smartphone application
